Module cyfight
Package fr.cyu.cyfight.event.listener

Interface FightStartingEventListener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameSceneController
public interface FightStartingEventListener
extends EventListener
The FightStartingEventListener is an interface that must be implemented by objects that want to be informed that a fight is starting.
Author:
Mika INISAN

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void onFightStarting​(java.lang.Object sender, FightStartingEventArgs eventArgs)
    Called when a fight is starting.

  • Method Details

    • onFightStarting

      void onFightStarting​(java.lang.Object sender, FightStartingEventArgs eventArgs)
      Called when a fight is starting.
      Parameters:
      sender - the object that requested the level change
      eventArgs - information about the level change
